Classes

class  Batch
 This class implements the batches used by the visual compound a batch is a grouping of objects contained in an area, i.e. More...

Detailed Description

This class implements the visual compound, the visual compound tries to combine visual instances into one object to limit the number of draw calls made by the engine.

Each visual compound handles the instances for one unique visual.

VisualCompound * Moo::VisualCompound::get ( const std::string &  visualName  )  [static]

This static method returns a visual compound for a specific visual If the compound is not already created a new one will be created.

Parameters:
visualName the name of the visual to get the compound for
Returns:
the visual compound or NULL if invalid

void Moo::VisualCompound::giveDelMutex (  )  [static]

This method gives the delete mutex which signals that the visual compound is not allowed to delete a compound while it is being held.

void Moo::VisualCompound::grabDelMutex (  )  [static]

This method grabs the delete mutex which signals that the visual compound is not allowed to delete a compound while it is being held.

bool Moo::VisualCompound::init ( const std::string &  resourceID  ) 

This method inits the source resource for this visual compound.

The input visual should be a static visual, with no nodes, the visual compound does not load nodes.

Parameters:
resourceID The resource id of the visual resource to base this compound on.
Returns:
true if successful, false otherwise.
